SpinDec2

Modules

module  grid
 Grid module contains subroutines to initialise grid related variables and allocate and deallocate memories for different grids used in the software.
 

Functions/Subroutines

subroutine, public grid::get_seed (seed_in)
 Subroutine to set random seed based on user input. If -1 is inputed for seed, a random seed is generated, otherwise the user provided seed is used. More...
 
subroutine grid::rand_uniform (x, min, max)
 Subroutine to output a random number from a uniform distribution between user provided lower and upper bound values. More...
 
subroutine grid::grid_init (grid, Nx, Ny, min, max, burn)
 Subroutine to initialise a given grid using values sampled from a uniform distribution with a given lower and upper bound. More...
 
subroutine, public grid::grid_initialise_local (Nx, Ny, c_min, c_max, T_min, T_max, problem, p, my_rank, my_rank_coords)
 Subroutine to calculate grid subdomain size, allocate needed memory for local concentration, Q, and M, and mu grids and allocate memory for corresponding halos. More...
 
subroutine, public grid::grid_initialise_global (Nx, Ny, Nt, my_rank)
 Subroutine to allocate memory for global concentration grid on rank 0. More...
 
subroutine, public grid::global_grid_deallocate (my_rank)
 Subroutine to deallocate memory of global concentration grids. More...
 
subroutine, public grid::local_grid_deallocate (my_rank)
 Subroutine to dellocate memory of local grids. More...
